main event: Two unidentified flying objects were sighted over Las Vegas, Nevada, on 15 July 1952.
interesting points: Observation reports indicate that the objects were cigar-shaped,The objects were reported to have been moving at a high speed and changing direction,Multiple witnesses reported the unusual flying objects,The first sighting was on 27 June 1952, and it was verified by other observers,The incident is considered significant enough to be one of the more interesting cases of 1952 reported to Project Blue Book.
witness description: The witnesses included residents and responsible observers in the area.
